au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=4m_L2=1.3m_central_BB
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(500,0) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 240 (for blocked beam) driveEntRotAp(240) # Drive beamstops up selBs(3)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(39.5, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(39.5, 0) driveBsz(262.5)
